content: Arsenal + SouthamptonSaturday + SundayFootball Prediction ContestGame 1:  Arsenal v Leeds United https://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/england/premier-league/arsenal-fc-v-leeds-united-640e504b2666e421fb5f633eGame 2:  Southampton v West Ham Unitedhttps://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/england/premier-league/west-ham-united-v-southampton-fc-640e526389e5404bbf96b44dRulesThis Prediction must be for both games1.  Predict the TOTAL combined amount of Corner Kicks + Offsides + Fouls in the match2.  Tiebreaker:  Predict the MINUTE of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores, VOID if no goals are scored)ExampleGame 1:  30, 20'Game 2:  30, 22'PrizesThe closest prediction wins a 1 mbtc Free BetIf you correctly predict the TOTAL combined amount of Corner Kicks + Offsides + Fouls in the match and successfully predict the MINUTE of the 1st Goal Scored, your Free Bet will be for  3 mbtc (1 mbtc if 1st Goal Scored MINUTE occurs in stoppage time)(Small print)* Must be active in Sports betting and/or Sports betting discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.
